articles.content: NEW YORK -- Fully vaccinated Americans can gather with other vaccinated people indoors without wearing a mask or social distancing, according to long-awaited guidance from federal health officials.Th… [+6025 chars]

articles.author: University Of Utah Health
articles.title: Should pregnant women get the COVID-19 vaccine? Experts weigh in - KSL.com
articles.description: Many women feel conflicted about getting one of the available COVID-19 vaccines while pregnant. U of U health experts provide some insight into the potential risks and benefits.
articles.content: When Lori learned that the COVID-19 vaccine would be available to her as a University of Utah Health employee in February 2021, she faced a daunting question. She'd given birth to her second son in l… [+6434 chars]
